[Y]Legacy and Lessons
[W]What still matters today.
[c][m.]
[W]The CPC story shows that sensible
[W]engineering and friendly design can
[W]build lasting communities.
[W]Constraint-based learning remains
[W]useful for modern coding education.
[c][m.]
[G]- Practical engineering.
[G]- Accessible learning.
[G]- Long-term community value.
[m][m-]

[C]History is useful when it informs
